availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, Farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Elizabeth Roosh Whaley. Father of William Whaley, Emily Whaley, Fannie Whaley, Mary Virginia Whaley, Benjamin Franklin Whaley, Braxton B. Whaley, and Emrada Whaley. Farmer in Bath County in 1850. Owned eight enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Owned Allace [Unknown] and Mary C. [Unknown] in Bath County in 1857. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved person in Bath County in 1860.
